| price = Free

The '''Summer of Arcade Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140916014017/http://playxbla.com/let-the-games-begin-summer-of-arcade-2012-is-here/|title=Summer Of Arcade 2012 ! Let The Games Begin!|website=playxbla.com|date=July 19, 2012|author=XBLA_Alex}}</ref> was a free [[skin pack]], featuring 15 skins of characters from video games that were part of the 2012 {{w|Summer of Arcade}} event on the {{w|Xbox Live Arcade}}. It was available exclusively {{in|xbox360}} for a limited time between July 18 and August 22, 2012 and can no longer be downloaded. During the aforementioned period, the skin pack could be downloaded through a promotion on the Xbox 360's dashboard.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.ign.com/wikis/minecraft/Summer_of_Arcade_Skin_Pack|title=Summer of Arcade Skin Pack - Minecraft Guide|website=IGN|date=July 3, 2013}}</ref>
